Comment: "Haha, isn't it weird?" asked the Vice President. He fidgeted, rubbed his hand anxiously on the armrest where he sat, a couch that looked like it'd seen more use than most in the White House. "I saw him and, just like that, he's dead. Weird, weird." He stared off into space for a second. "Who could have thought?" His right eye twitched, irritated by eyeliner or some deeper, troubling thought. "Nobody. Of course. How weird..."
